XENBRIDGE_MAIN_TITLE: XenBridge - Synchronize your site with your Xenforo forum!
PLUGIN_DEVELOPED_BY: Plugin developed by kenshimdev - https://kenshimdev.fr/ | Reviewed & corrected by Kuro
XENBRIDGE_PRESENTATION_TITLE: XenBridge allows you to link your mineweb site to your Xenforo forum, so new users registered on your site will also be registered on your forum.
XENAPI_LABEL_XENAPI_KEY: API Key (XenAPI) | API KEY Générator on 'CE LIEN'
XENAPI_KEY_LENGTH_ERROR: The XenAPI key must be between 20 and 50 characters.
XENAPI_CONFIG_ADD_SUCCESS: The configuration has been added successfully.
XENAPI_CONFIG_EDIT_SUCCESS: Your configuration has been successfully changed.
XENAPI_FULLPATH_LENGTH_ERROR: The absolute URL to the API of your forum must be at least 15 characters.
XENBRIDGE_PREREQUISITES_TITLE: Checking the prerequisites before activating XenBridge
XENBRIDGE_SSL_MANDATORY: You must imperatively put your site under SSL (https) to activate XenBridge!
XENBRIDGE_SSL_OK_MINEWEB: OK, your site "mineweb" uses a secure SSL (https) protocol.
XENBRIDGE_SSL_NOTOK_MINEWEB: NOT OK.Your site "mineweb" must be under a secure SSL (https) protocol.
XENBRIDGE_SSL_OK_FORUM: OK, your Xenforo forum uses a secure SSL (https) protocol.
XENBRIDGE_SSL_NOTOK_FORUM: NOT OK Your Xenforo forum must be under a secure SSL (https) protocol.
XENBRIDGE_API_DOWNLOAD: To download the api.php file go to 'THIS LINK'
XENBRIDGE_API_DOWNLOAD_EXPLAIN: Once you have the file in your hands, just put the file api.php at the root directory of your XenForo folder
